I'm delighted to recommend two films that perfectly blend excitement and warmth, while focusing on the war genre as per your preference.

Firstly, "American Sniper" is a gripping tale about a legendary Navy SEAL sniper named Chris Kyle, portrayed by Bradley Cooper. The film delves into his tour of duty and the challenges he faced both on and off the battlefield.

Secondly, "Saving Private Ryan" is an epic story set during World War II, directed by Steven Spielberg. The movie follows a group of soldiers as they embark on a mission to find a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action. This film features an impressive ensemble cast including Tom Hanks and Matt Damon. Both movies offer captivating plots that I believe you'll enjoy exploring further!
